scripts.build:public:ui: yarn --cwd packages/ui run storybook:build && cp -r packages/ui/storybook packages/server/public/storybook
scripts.build:public:utils: yarn --cwd packages/utils run doc && cp -r packages/utils/docs packages/server/public/docs/@wener/utils
scripts.build:public:tinyrpc: yarn --cwd packages/tinyrpc run doc  && cp -r packages/tinyrpc/docs packages/server/public/docs/@wener/tinyrpc
scripts.pub: yarn build:tinyrpc && yarn build:utils && yarn build:ui && yarn lerna publish prerelease --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/  --no-push
scripts.pub:build: yarn build:tinyrpc && yarn build:utils && yarn build:ui && yarn --cwd packages/server tsc --noEmit
scripts.sort: npx sort-package-json package.json tsconfig*.json packages/*/package.json packages/*/tsconfig*.json && prettier --write package.json tsconfig*.json packages/*/package.json packages/*/tsconfig*.json
